name: Revolt (itch) (Thomas Jowsey)
description:
A despicable source of power finds a new host. Harness magical power once used to control your people, and cast it against the very tyrants who created it.

REVOLT is a horde spell-casting game - think Vampire Survivors meets Skyrim.



  • A flexible and diverse spell-casting system gives you the power to wield fireballs, living spirits, powerful summons, ferocious storms, and more.
  • Epic boss battles test your might  - defeat powerful summoners who will stop at nothing to ensure you fight no further.
  • Upgrades put the power in your hands - literally! Choose from a range of abilities to give you the decisive edge in battle.
  • Custom modifiers allow you to play your way - no two rounds are the same.
  • An ever-growing horde keeps you on your toes - play aggressively, or quickly become overwhelmed!

Revolt is a prototype! While the foundations for many features are already in place, content including spells, maps, and enemies is still quite sparse. Expect to see more new content coming with future updates!

Current content doesn't represent the final vision for the game!

Notes: 

  • The game does not currently have audio, as content changes often. This is due to change in the future.
